name: Add a product to cart, hover over cart icon, verify user can remove a product

steps.name: When Hover over the mouse to <MAC>.
And Hover the mouse to <MacBook Pro 13-inch> button and click on it.
And Click on ADD TO CART button.
And Hover the mouse to cart icon.
Then Verify user can remove a product.

fullName: Tests for product page: Add a product to cart, hover over cart icon, verify user can remove a product
